questions.question: Can I buy tickets for the event through this platform?
questions.answer: Yes! This platform allows you to securely purchase tickets for the one-day or two-day event option.

questions.question: Can I cancel my ticket and get a refund?
questions.answer: We understand that unexpected circumstances can arise. Unfortunately, due to the nature of the event, we operate with a no-refund policy for all ticket purchases.

questions.question: How do I pay for my ticket?
questions.answer: We have a number of payment options for your convenience - card payment, bank transfer and USSD.

questions.question: Can I buy tickets for other people?
questions.answer: Absolutely!  You can purchase tickets for others, but keep in mind they will need to check their emails to claim their tickets. Please note that this feature is in development. Check back later.

questions.question: What information do I need to provide when buying tickets for others?
questions.answer: You will need to provide the email address for each person you are purchasing tickets for.

questions.question: Will the people I buy tickets for receive a confirmation email?
questions.answer: Yes, they will receive an email prompting them to confirm their registration.

questions.question: I purchased a ticket for someone else. How do they claim their ticket?
questions.answer: The person you purchased a ticket for will receive an email prompting them to register for the event.  After successful registration, they will receive a confirmation email and they will be able to access and claim their ticket through the platform.

questions.question: I haven't received an email to claim my ticket. What should I do?
questions.answer: First, check your spam folder. If you still can't find the email, contact DevFest Lagos directly on @gdglagos on Twitter.

questions.question: Can I claim my ticket before registering for the event?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, no. Tickets can only be claimed after successful purchase.

questions.question: I purchased a one-day ticket, but now I want to attend both days. Can I upgrade my ticket?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your one-day ticket to a two-day ticket through this platform (depending on availability). Please note that this feature is in development. Check back later.

questions.question: How do I upgrade my ticket?
questions.answer: Look for the 'Upgrade Ticket' option within your ticket purchase history in your User Profile. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the upgrade process. Please note that this feature is in development. Check back later.

questions.question: Will I receive a new ticket after upgrading?
questions.answer: Yes, once your upgrade is complete, you will receive a new ticket reflecting your two-day access to the event.
